name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: This records identifiers associated with this medication request that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. For example a re-imbursement system might issue its own id for each prescription that is created.  This is particularly important where FHIR only provides part of an entire workflow process where records must be tracked through an entire system.

name: $addidentifier
desc: This records identifiers associated with this medication request that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. For example a re-imbursement system might issue its own id for each prescription that is created.  This is particularly important where FHIR only provides part of an entire workflow process where records must be tracked through an entire system.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this medication request that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. For example a re-imbursement system might issue its o

name: $definition
desc: Returns: Protocol or definition followed by this request.

name: $adddefinition
desc: Protocol or definition followed by this request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Protocol or definition followed by this request.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A plan or request that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this medication request.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: A plan or request that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this medication request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A plan or request that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this medication request.

name: $groupIdentifier
desc: Returns: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition or prescription.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition or prescription.

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code specifying the current state of the order.  Generally this will be active or completed state.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code specifying the current state of the order.  Generally this will be active or completed state.

name: $intent
desc: Returns: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, or an original order.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, or an original order.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Indicates the type of medication order and where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the type of medication order and where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Indicates how quickly the Medication Request should be addressed with respect to other requests.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the Medication Request should be addressed with respect to other requests.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: A link to a resource representing the person or set of individuals to whom the medication will be given.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A link to a resource representing the person or set of individuals to whom the medication will be given.

name: $context
desc: Returns: A link to an encounter, or episode of care, that identifies the particular occurrence or set occurrences of contact between patient and health care provider.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A link to an encounter, or episode of care, that identifies the particular occurrence or set occurrences of contact between patient and health care provider.

name: $supportingInformation
desc: Returns: Include additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the ordering of the medication.

name: $addsupportingInformation
desc: Include additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the ordering of the medication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Include additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the ordering of the medication.

name: $authoredOn
desc: Returns: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was initially written or authored on.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was initially written or authored on.

name: $requester
desc: Returns: The individual, organization or device that initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual, organization or device that initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

name: $recorder
desc: Returns: The person who entered the order on behalf of another individual for example in the case of a verbal or a telephone order.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person who entered the order on behalf of another individual for example in the case of a verbal or a telephone order.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: The reason or the indication for ordering the medication.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: The reason or the indication for ordering the medication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The reason or the indication for ordering the medication.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was ordered.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was ordered.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was ordered.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Extra information about the prescription that could not be conveyed by the other attributes.

name: $addnote
desc: Extra information about the prescription that could not be conveyed by the other attributes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Extra information about the prescription that could not be conveyed by the other attributes.

name: $dosageInstruction
desc: Returns: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

name: $adddosageInstruction
desc: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

name: $dispenseRequest
desc: Returns: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order).  Note that this information is not always sent with the order.  There may be in some settings (e.g. hospitals) institutional or system support for completing the dispense details in the pharmacy department.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order).  Note that this information is not always sent with the order.  There may be in some settings

name: $substitution
desc: Returns: Indicates whether or not substitution can or should be part of the dispense. In some cases substitution must happen, in other cases substitution must not happen. This block explains the prescriber's intent. If nothing is specified substitution may be done.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether or not substitution can or should be part of the dispense. In some cases substitution must happen, in other cases substitution must not happen. This block explains the prescriber's intent. If nothing is specified substitution may be done

name: $priorPrescription
desc: Returns: A link to a resource representing an earlier order related order or prescription.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A link to a resource representing an earlier order related order or prescription.

name: $detectedIssue
desc: Returns: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. Drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

name: $adddetectedIssue
desc: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. Drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. Drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

name: $eventHistory
desc: Returns: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.

name: $addeventHistory
desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.
